Allright, this is partly my fault (there was a big storm in my area and I lost net connection for a while, hence the site being down), but next time there is a wrestling debate like this using RPG email, quite a few people are going to permenately (and painfully) lose the ability to type.

Having said that, sorry that I havn't posted today till now. My mom had surgery this morning and I've been taking care of her. She's asleep now, so I'm posting.

::Cledar/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::

Firearm growls at whoever called him a rustbucket. "Watch your mouth. I might miss and hit you during my match."

He enters his arena, running some diagnostics on his weapons to make sure they were all functioning.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Cledar and his troops enter their arenas, now commenting on being called rustbuckets. THey would have, of course, gladdly shot at the one who called them that, except that would get them all killed.
